extendedInfo.description: A fully-featured tip calculator.Features:1. Ability to enter a bill amount, tip percentage, number of people, and tax from nearly one screen.2. Customizable defaults for your two most common tip percentages.3. Automatically saves the tip percentage that you used last.4. Clean, easy-to-use interface5. Large font and maximum brightness setting for easy use in dark restaurants.6. Determines the tax rate used for your meal based on the tax amount entered.If you encounter any problems while using this app, please send an email to: support@dependableapps.comIf you would like to suggest a feature or give us feedback, please send an email to: feedback@dependableapps.comTo view more of our apps, please visit our website: http://dependableapps.comNote: This is the free version of our tip calculator app. This version has advertisements. The pro version has more features, including no advertisements and the option to round the tip or total.Permissions:Internet - For the AdvertisementsAccess Network State - For the Advertisements

reviews.title: Tip
reviews.comment: Easy to use and better than me trying to figure it out.
reviews.author: A Google User
